snippet.title: Projekt Melody: A nut between worlds! - Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
I'm excited to announce a joint venture with the largest h-video for vr provider HVR.

We are developing “A nut between worlds”, a full 3D H-A-RPG.

In our story you will get sucked into a wild adventure.

Drop into Virtual Little Tokyo, a vibrant city nestled in the heart of Cyberspace! Discover dark and menacing dungeons, tech-enhanced civilizations, cute maid cafes and much more!

We have set our aim at creating highly polished h-game experiences so you can have your big bang while playing them!

Our virtual worlds are for everyone, filled with gorgeous characters and adventure galore! Explore the beauty of the Cyberverse and find true love along the way!

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/BigBangStudio

Twitch ⯈ https://www.twitch.tv/projektmelody
Twitter ⯈ https://twitter.com/ProjektMelody
Patreon/Discord ⯈ https://www.patreon.com/projektmelody
